[Home](doc/markdown/./index.md) &gt; [@zephyr3d/base](doc/markdown/./base.md) &gt; [VFS](doc/markdown/./base.vfs.md)

## VFS class

Abstract base class for virtual file systems.

Provides a standardized interface for file system operations and supports mounting other VFS instances at specific paths for composition.

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare abstract class VFS extends Observable<{
    changed: [type: 'created' | 'deleted' | 'moved' | 'modified', path: string, itemType: 'file' | 'directory'];
}> 
```
**Extends:** [Observable](doc/markdown/./base.observable.md)<!-- -->&lt;{ changed: \[type: 'created' \| 'deleted' \| 'moved' \| 'modified', path: string, itemType: 'file' \| 'directory'\]; }&gt;

<tr><td>

[mount(path, vfs)](doc/markdown/./base.vfs.mount.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Mounts another VFS at the specified path.

Constraints/Behavior: - Mount path can be an existing directory or non existing directory. - Changes from child VFS will bubble to host namespace (path is rewritten with mount prefix)


</td></tr>
<tr><td>

[move(sourcePath, targetPath, options)](doc/markdown/./base.vfs.move.md)

</td><td>


</td><td>

Normalizes a path, resolving . and .. components and making it absolute. Supports both absolute and relative paths.

<tr><td>

[unmount(path)](doc/markdown/./base.vfs.unmount.md)


</td><td>


</td><td>

Unmounts a VFS from the specified path.

Behavior: - Removes the mount record. - If the mount directory was auto-created by this VFS and `cleanupOnUnmount` is true, it will be removed only if it is still empty.


</td></tr>
